properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat. The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors.
A spacious four bedroom detached house featuring a large garden and garage. Ideal for growing families, located near excellent local schools.
Modern one bedroom apartment perfect for professionals. Close to city center amenities and public transport links.
Luxury five bedroom villa with swimming pool and private driveway. This property offers exclusive living in a quiet residential area.
Stunning three bedroom penthouse with panoramic views. Features a roof terrace and open plan living space.
Cozy two bedroom cottage with original features and fireplace. Located in a charming village setting.
